title: Appendix 10 - Safety Assessment (Five Safes)
purpose: Assess the adequacy of controls across the Five Safes model before releasing synthetic data.

fields.name: accessPeople

fields.name: approvals

fields.name: residualRisk

fields.name: dataMinimisation

fields.name: securityControls
